public boolean hasPrivilege(java.lang.String privilege,
                            int scope)
Description copied from interface: AuthorityManager
determines if the logged in user has the correct privilege. For a Privilege to match it must be of the same scope.

Specified by:
hasPrivilege in interface AuthorityManager
Parameters:
privilege - the privilege to check for
scope - the scope of the Privilege to check for
Returns:
true if this user has the correctly scoped privilege

getPrivilegesForUser

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,RolePrivilege> getPrivilegesForUser(User user)
Description copied from interface: AuthorityManager
gets a single Map of Privileges that this User has based on their Role membership. The HashMap will contain the Privilege the user has with the broadest scope.

Specified by:
getPrivilegesForUser in interface AuthorityManager
Parameters:
user - the User object
Returns:
a HashMap of all Privileges this user has keyed by the Privilege code
